ns2:test-suite.name: Verify that user is not able to comment on the story by selecting Hide option in Comment dropdown
ns2:test-suite.title: Verify that user is not able to comment on the story by selecting Hide option in Comment dropdown

test-case.name: On Clicking Create Story From the Template user should be navigated to story creation page and Comment dropdown should be set to Hide by default
test-case.title: On Clicking Create Story From the Template user should be navigated to story creation page and Comment dropdown should be set to Hide by default

test-case.name: On saving the story and opening it on Arc front end comment section should not be present in the story
test-case.title: On saving the story and opening it on Arc front end comment section should not be present in the story
